forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock drifts toward mid-afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, one can observe a pleasantly mild day unfolding. The sun peeks through a canvas of blue, promising warmth with a high near 63 degrees, gently caressed by a cool west wind that whispers at around 18 mph. The clarity of the day reveals a distant view of the Golden Gate Bridge framed by a soft, gently dissipating marine layer, hinting at traces of fog that linger near the waterfront, yet remain mostly at bay. The city’s iconic skyline stands ensconced in a delicate glow, inviting an afternoon stroll through its vibrant streets.

As dusk approaches, anticipate a tranquil evening with partial cloud cover and a low settling around 52 degrees. The consistent winds will continue, softening the lingering chill of the evening, so a light jacket may provide the comfort needed as one ventures out for a leisurely meal or perhaps an unhurried walk along the Embarcadero. Embrace the allure of this splendid afternoon by exploring the local cafés, or indulge in a moment of introspection at one of the many parks, soaking in the ambiance of the evening skyline.
